草拟吗了个母牛东西 暴雪你妈了个比就是纯减重 守望先锋就是送诶你妈的骨灰盒 今天就是你妈的忌日狗娘养的游戏 老子随便拉个人都比你会做狗 操你妈的傻逼东西 怎么现在填这个B脸上steam了 狗玩意 要你妈个B脸了废物东西 几把吃相这么难看你踏马算个乱 能不能带着你的守望先锋给老子滚啊 废物东西 这个世界不需要守望先锋 你妈临终缺钱了是不是带他妈的死灰游戏现在上线了 咋的活不过你妈头7了是吧

Its not the Overwatch I paid for in 2018, nor the one I spent 1000 hours in. Its getting better then it was at October launch. It still has a ways to go though, a lot was removed from the original game, but its kinda slowly being dripped back in. The most pressing issues right now? The sheer amount of cheaters. Insta headlocks, one shot killing 200HP targets with a single headshot that only deals 140 damage, its so blatant, yet Blizzard seem very reluctant to do anything about it. 

Matchmaking doesn't seem to improve much either, which is odd, as the Overwatch matchmaker seemed to work pretty well, since adding a 2 a lot of the working stuff got broken. The game could improve, but first Blizzard would need to get the team to actually care again. It seems a lot of the old staff that did care have all left. Maybe I'm wrong, but until Steam adds a "sort of" option to the "Do you recommend this game?" at least until the F2P cheater issue is addressed, I can't really recommend the game. Its good when it works, and the matchmaker doesn't work against you though.

[b] A love letter to activision [/b] 
Thank you for diluting a franchise that used to be rich and bountiful. You’ve reduced it to nothing more than an anti-consumer cash cow. Although you’re one step up from Gacha Mobile Games, you’re not far from it. Please bring back what we once loved. The fans deserve better. Gamers have spent and catalogued decades worth of gameplay for you just for this to be the return. It only shows how little you truly care and how willing you are to make a quick buck off of anyone you can. You’re no better than EA. 


[b] The review [/b]

It’s exactly what you’d expect from activision. Once upon a time they made decent games, some would even say great. Now a days they’re in a head to head competition to be the worst in the industry with EA. Not only is everything paywalled, but it feels rushed and undeveloped. When Overwatch first released there seemed to be a definitive plan. Heroes releasing to add on to the gameplay instead of filling niche roles.  Characters released with many cosmetics, highlight intros and taunts. Now, taunts are added via battlepass and are just clones of each other. Characters aren’t developed and don’t retain any lore nor create new lore for fans to follow. As a matter of fact the newest character Illari doesn’t come with any lore whatsoever. We, as a player base, were left in the dark literally until release. No information on her kit, the numbers, or the backstory.


The path activision forced the developers down was a dark one. Although there may be people working on this game as a passion project still, it sure doesn’t come across as one. When players are prayed on with a micro transaction scheme after being fed false hope for YEARS. Yes YEARS. Not a month of lies and empty promises, but years. There’s nothing left to do other than leave a negative review in hopes of change. 



Drip feeding content is the new normal in the industry and overwatch 2 just feeds into it even more. There’s many other games to be devoted to…. So don’t be like me and wait around for something to pay off that never will. Move on. Pick something else. This was just another disaster in the modern world of gaming. Thanks Blizzard for slowly and painfully destroying a game franchise many players adored. We really appreciate it.
